system.effect: As a Free Action, a crewmember on the bridge can open the cargo hatches and forcibly eject its contents into the void. +75 Achievement Points towards Trade Objectives. One per Vessel.

description.value: As a Free Action, a crewmember on the bridge can open the cargo hatches and forcibly eject its contents into the void. +75 Achievement Points towards Trade Objectives. One per Vessel.
